import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext, useEffect,useState } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext' import axios from 'axios' function ProfilePage() { const navigate = useNavigate() const [user,setUser]=useState() const {userId} = useContext(UserContext) const [date,setDate] = useState() useEffect(()=>{ console.log(userId) if(userId){ axios.get( `http://localhost:5000/GetUser/${userId}`).then((res)=>{ setUser(res.data) setDate(res.data.createdAt.slice(0,10)) }) }},[]) return (

{ user && user.name}

Created at : { date && date}

Profile settings

Order list

) } export default ProfilePage
